name: jdhenry105
text: A comment left by jdhenry105 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pjalne, Norsef, divot, madnes, chivalress, LordPretzel, regrepsnefpoh, DanS, pulkbaby, wehavemagnums)

name: mira
text: I did note that. I did.

name: lexsenthur
text: I noted your noting. So noted.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: It is not rad having seen a dude's chutney.

name: draykid
text: Things are never the same once you seen a guy's chutney .

name: jesler729
text:
Oh man why the lames

I'd say that comment is pretty correct

name: stuart
text: Suddenly I understand the alt text.

name: billylk
text:
And like THAT

poof


he's gone.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ex-ACT-ly.

name: c_dizzle
text:
Exactly. It's assuming no one else would have caught that. I think by now it's safe to assume anyone reading achewood is keen to the subtle and not-so-subtle innuendos which make the comic so...fucking...good.

So good.

name: aperson
text: You overestimate me, Herr Dizzle.

name: carlyle
text: I'd say it is pretty obvious

name: saint
text: i daresay that makes the comic

name: whitey
text: Unlike Sheryl Crow, Ray wipes with the whole roll.

name: pulkbaby
text:
http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/one_strip?b=M%5ea11f09b8576e606bcb5038dfdb92fb821&u=http%3A%2F%2Fachewood.com%2Fcomic.php%3Fdate%3D10282005
Belgian waffle comment makes (more) sense now.

name: johnnyrocker
text: I've done that.

name: johnnyrocker
text: I've done that.

name: hellofyellin
text:
Also note he uses the 'reverse reach-around' wiping method.

Classic Ray.

name: geysershitdick
text: A comment left by geysershitdick was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by cailetshadow, J-Man, aperson)

name: hellofyellin
text: Well, you have the "seated tween-leg", which is what I advocate.  Much more effective.  Some go for the "leg-up standing reach-around", but these people are generally regarded as heretics.

name: geysershitdick
text: A comment left by geysershitdick was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, J-Man, aperson)

name: hellofyellin
text: Dude.  Getcha some wet wipes.  So nice.  SO soft.

name: hellofyellin
text: Also YOU CRAZY.

name: deancain29
text: I favour the stand up - this means I get to immediately survey what I have done.

name: jesler729
text: Oh man what, who wipes between their legs. Ray is doing it the completely correct way.

name: nutmeg
text: worst conversation in the english language

name: tangles
text: actually, ...

name: tangles
text: goddamnit assetbar. guess you're going to have to copy and paste for this one: http://achewood.com/index.php?date=10112006

name: nbgreene
text: hes doing it right. his tail gets in the way if he stands up.

name: hellofyellin
text: HERETIC

name: mirzabah
text: I just kind of lean forward and let my people do it for me.

name: gouldgonewild
text: ...you aren't supposed to stand up to wipe your ass?

name: hellofyellin
text: HERETIC!

name: soticoto
text:
... I'm frankly horrified that anyone would willingly reach INTO the toilet-bowl WHILE sitting down in order to wipe their own arse.
Heck, I don't even sit down while I'm doing the business, much less when wiping. Years of having to use public toilets ( circumstances ) got me into the squatting habit.

name: ravenmancer
text: If you're sitting, does that mean you're doing a pulling motion, bringing the poo towards the sack?  'Cause that just seems wrong to me.

name: hellofyellin
text: Feel how you will, and I admit you must be thorough, but "Tweenin'" it gives you must more control with the wrist.  And control is key.

name: hellofyellin
text:
*much

It is, however, tiring. Do not attempt to type after this method.

name: straw
text: This is by far the best conversation on the Achewood-Community

name: pitseleh
text: I agree. With Achewood, not only do you get hilarious strips, but you also get awesome interaction with other readers. It's a win-win, you see?

name: jackparsons
text: A comment left by jackparsons was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, Deusoma, Ariamaki, TonyHighwind, relaxing, hikikomori, pitseleh, Baryonyx, LRosetw8)

name: deancain29
text: I love getting laid, but I also love being on my own - its a win-win situation.

name: saru
text: But sex is a win-win!

name: spenham
text:
Butt sex is a win-win!

I'm sorry. Uncontrollable need to post this after thinking it.

name: laserblade
text:
"BUTT SEX IS A WIN-WIN!"

But what qualifies you to say that?

"I'M A BANANA!"

name: tatterdemalion
text: See, it's imagining your avatar saying all that...that yes, just makes it for me.  Kudos to you.

name: johnnyrocker
text: What the heck? How is the phrase "win-win" a turnoff?

name: splendorr
text: Dames distrust echoes. Genetically.

name: stuart
text: Basically I don't want my forearm touchin' my dick.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
well shit, how do you take a leak if you're afraid of one appendage touching the other? Eyes closed and with tongs? It's just your forearm, not your cornea.

But, being an aging man, I think I have now tried most wiping methods, including the well-named "Tweenin," and yes, it is actually very effective, in certain respects. You just have to get over a kind of adolescent fear of feeling like your a woman (if you're a man) wiping the other area. Notice it's been mostly men who've responding to this so far. Not surprising. Also, this will probably be lamed, and rightly so.

name: hellofyellin
text: I agree.  You can't let your dick tell you what's up.  You just grab that thing, look it square in the eye and tell it, "Yeah, we doin' this!"

name: stuart
text: But if you do it too much you'll make God cry.

name: jlowe424
text: Whilst riding the toilet sidesaddle style...

name: norrin
text: I pictured this and laughed. Which is bad because I am at work.

name: saru
text: If you do that though, you'd get urine in your eye. I can't possibly imagine what you'd hope to achieve by this.

name: slalvation
text: Getting urine in your eye maybe.

name: boredom_man
text: What we need here is some Alexander Portnoy/Mickey Sabbath crossover fanfic

name: mr_lostman28
text: oh god... "Yeah, we doing this!" nearly had me in tears! This whole conversation is why assetbar is both terrible and awesome at the same time.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
eyes closed and with tongs

chubby

name: ted0phile
text: I hope it will please you to know that "It's just your forearm, not your cornea" made me laugh out loud.

name: fineoakstructure
text: It does, ted...it does.

name: rayj3rd
text: I did not lame this.  In fact, I chubbied it - Simply for the line "It's just your forearm, not your cornea."  Best line in the whole damn thread.

name: molesticide
text:
one up, one down, one to polish.

i don't dig between the legs cuz i might get my hand in the water. it's bad enough when the tip gets dunked, i don't want my fucking hand in there.

name: gormster
text: Chubbied for truth.

name: awko
text: Wait. How much water is there in your toilet? Is it filled almost to the brim or are your turds so enormous it's like when a fat man gets into a kiddie pool?

name: fineoakstructure
text: I hate to say it, but that happened to me just this morning at work.  It's not like at home, where I know the water level is pretty consistent.  I went in for the tweenin' and got the bog water on my knuckles.  Some toilets have more water than others.

name: spicyponyhead
text: Yeah, that's disgusting (poo towards sack). Your ass is BEHIND for a reason.

name: saru
text:
You wipe back to front for health reasons. These are more important for female persons, but still a good idea for guys.
Also, I have never before wiped while seated. I did not even consider that this could be an option.

name: jocelynthepink
text: NONONO front to back for health reasons! You don't want fecal matter in your genitalia. Is not good.

name: kochipoik
text:
Yeah yeah, it's "wipe from front to back, cause [you] don't wanna get a bladder infection". Mostly applies to girl's, but in the case of the NOFX song, a man-turned-girl.

The idea of back to front is bizarre, I have to say. And between the legs? Wouldn't stuff just be generally in the way?

name: hellofyellin
text:
Yes, there is some lifting involved.

And don't you tell me that I'm wiping my ass wrong, because then I might just have to go off and kill myself because of what my life has come to.

name: yingkaixing
text: Do what I did. $10k up front

name: aliiis
text: 10k chubbies for this comment

name: tekende
text:
Like the old saying goes...

"Front to back,
No poo on your sac"

name: goro
text: I have never even considered not doing front to back, it just seems like it would be considerably harder and imply a lot of detail work.

name: i_love_kate
text: I wonder if anyone would understand what I meant if I said that I can totally imagine Oaky Doke saying this.

name: i_love_kate
text: TWO YEARS LATER: Nope.

name: centipede_damascus
text: generally for wiping I am kind of seated and I reach down between my legs from the front with a sheet of toilet paper that has been folded exactly four times and oh my lord why am I telling people this on the Internet

name: diggidy
text:
I favor the Reverse Angle Wallaby-Wipe myself.
Do it right and the entire area can be cleaned with just 2 squares.
Do it wrong and you're required to wash your entire forearm in a chemical bath, then burn your clothes.

name: leia
text: I now know way too fucking much about how you all wipe your asses.

name: heccibiggs
text: I know, right. Why did I read that entire thread.

name: hellofyellin
text: Because this sort of open dialog is important for the community.  Dammit.

name: woodenteeth
text: Just so you know, I seriously had no idea that anyone wiped their arse anyway aside from Tweenin'-style. My mind is blown.

name: stereo
text:
See, this is what happens when you make subjects taboo.

People just don't know what's normal.

name: i_love_kate
text: Me too. I'm keen to attempt a transition in technique, but I don't want to if it's going to mean sacrificing my current experience.

name: woodenteeth
text: Just alternate from now on and enrich your experience all 'round.

name: hellofyellin
text: One joke post and several pages of responses later, I have it. I got people to talk about poo on the internet. This is to be my legacy.

name: rayj3rd
text: Apparently, there should be a class in school about this because - no matter which way is correct - there are just a whole lot of people doing it wrong.  This is a serious problem which must be addressed.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Beef desperately holding his nose, his eyes about tearing up.
He braves the stench to get the recipe right.

name: whitey
text: Also, he has a hella solid jumpshot.

name: deimosrising
text: People have accused Ray of lucking into all his money, but he is clearly an extremely savvy businessman. This isn't even something that Home Depot really deals in!

name: epicurus
text: The caption under the last panel adds much.

name: sargasm
text: Beef's line is funnier if you hear him say it holding his nose like that.

name: straw
text: ...SAUCE!

name: darthemed
text: So is the chain of Chochacho's medallion invisible from behind, or what?

name: saru
text: Covered by neck-flab and fur, totally.

name: heavymetaljesus
text: Now where would he get "Slow-Roasted Ancho-Raisin Chutney" from?

name: pseudochron
text: Roast Beef is the reason this strip is good.

name: rotavele
text: I always thought wiping from behind was wierd, I don't care if my hands all near my junk, I kick ass.

name: iidebaser
text: somewhere out there this thread is scrolling across the face of a bottle of ketchup.

name: gussiejives
text: Swish!  Three points!

name: finemusk
text: Doin' business while doin' business. My hero

name: finemusk
text: Doin' business while doin' business. My hero (pro)

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs (Saturday - Monday)

Ray: The world was made for me!
Pat: Siccio, the IDIOT, has died.

name: cagliostro
text: Oh God, I love the blogs so much. Thankyou xiaomimi. Thankyou Mr Onstad.

name: direhaggis
text:
I have some unspoken rule about never having soiled toilet paper anywhere outside of the bowl radius. Ray just defies all, making the three-pointer, flushing.

Wait: did he actually get up JUST to make the three-pointer?

name: pogo
text: Nope, not funny.  Don't get what he's selling.

name: tekende
text: Food.

name: nice-on-water
text:
There are so many elements to this comic that make it good: first of all, the set-up with the caption, but also the operator being able to connect Ray to the CEO of Home Depot, Beef coming in eyes closed and nose plugged, his ridiculous wine calorie count rhyme, Ray wiping and shooting from the three, and obviously the "Verbal Kint"

Brilliant? YOU decide.

name: nonemorenegative
text:
I dunno what Ray must've been eating the night before if looking at his stew gives him the slow-roasted ancho-raisin chutney idea.

Conversely, I don't think I'll ever eat slow-roasted ancho-raisin chutney now.

name: sharpdresseddan
text: I would have rated this strio higher if it came up less often on the "random strips"

name: hardelicious
text: If you look at this strip for a little longer, you'll realize that, in between wiping his ass and throwing the paper in the toilet, Ray pulled his thong up.  My question is this: with the phone in one hand, pulling his thong up with the other, what was going on in shitty-toilet-paper-wad-land?

name: nyl
text: This is more than I have ever accomplished while on the toilet.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: you must be doing it wrong, then.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i made this for this comic only:

[IMGS OFF]

name: tambourine
text: I thought Ray rocked the toilet side-saddle?

name: rayj3rd
text: So did I.  I was a bit confused since continuity is very strong throughout Achewood.  Maybe he switched after Japan Man ridiculed him?

name: andrewthepig
text: As time goes on it's disturbing how many bizarre products I see being sold that could have been a result of Ray getting things done.

name: tbtabby
text:
Ray getting things done: awesome.

Used toilet paper being thrown through the air: not so much.
